sentence.Network_en: The idea of family, mutuality , the sharing of benefits and burdens for the good of all.

sentence.Network_en: He practiced Guanxi, a Chinese term that conveys trust and mutuality.

sentence.Network_en: Caring develops best on a plane of quality, of mutuality.
